PARAGRAPH.STRING: (BVI) is a British overseas territory, located in the Caribbean to the east of Puerto Rico.
make up part of the Virgin Islands archipelago (the remainder constituting the U.S. Virgin Islands; see also Spanish Virgin Islands).
consist of the main islands of Tortola, Virgin Gorda, Anegada and Jost Van Dyke, along with over 50 other smaller islands and cays. Around 15 of
are inhabited. The largest island, Tortola, is approximately 12 miles (19 km) long and 3 miles (5 km) wide.
have a total population of about 22,000. Road Town, the capital, is situated on Tortola.
